title: Unakkenna Mele Nindrai Lyrics Simla Special
stanzas:
Unakkenna mele nindraai
oh nandhalaala.
unadhaanai paadugindren
naan romba naalaa.

thaai madiyil pirandhom
Tamizh madiyil valarndhom.
nadigar ena malarndhom
naadagathil kalandhom
thathom thathom thatha
thaganiga thathom thathom thatha
thaganiga thathom thathom thatha
thaganiga thom

aadaatha maedai illai
podaatha vesham illai(2)
sindhaatha kaneerillai
sirippukkum panjam illai
kaal kondum aadum pillai
nool kondu aadum bommai.

kaal kondum aadum pillai
nool kondu aadum bommai.
un kaiyil andha noolaa
nee sollu nandhalaalaa.

yaaraaro nanban endru
yaemaandha nenjam undu(2)
poovendru mullai kandu
puriyaamal nindren indru
paal pola kallum undu
niraththaale rendum ondru

paal pola kallum undu
niraththaale rendum ondru
naanenna kallaa paalaa
nee sollu nandhalaalaa

paal pola kallum undu
niraththaale rendum ondru

Unakkenna mele nindraai
oh nandhalaala.
unadhaanai paadugindren
naan romba naalaa.

thaga niga thaga thathandhom
thaga niga thaga thathandhom
thaga niga thaga thathandhom
thaganiga thathom thathom thatha
thaganiga thathom thathom thatha
thaganiga thom
